sourcesContent:
import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import './ItemCard.css' import { isDisabled } from '@testing-library/user-event/dist/utils' export const ItemCard = ( { category, id, thumbnail, title, brand, price, rating } ) =>{ const handleSubmitCart = (e) =>{ e.preventDefault() const guardarLocalStorage = (id) => localStorage.setItem(`produtosCarrinho`, JSON.stringify(id)) const pegarLocalStorage = () => JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('produtosCarrinho')) ?? [] const dbCLient = pegarLocalStorage() dbCLient.push(id) guardarLocalStorage(dbCLient) if(dbCLient.includes(id)){ document.getElementById('btn-addFav').disabled = true } } const handleSubmitFav = (e) =>{ e.preventDefault() const guardarLocalStorage = (id) => localStorage.setItem(`produtosFavoritados`, JSON.stringify(id)) const pegarLocalStorage = () => JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('produtosFavoritados')) ?? [] const dbCLient = pegarLocalStorage() dbCLient.push(id) guardarLocalStorage(dbCLient) } return(

{category}

{title}

{brand}

R$: {price},00

Avaliação: {rating}

) }
